rooms.name: BiffCo Tower & Casino
rooms.description: A towering, neon-soaked casino complex dominating the skyline.

rooms.name: Main Strip (1985A)
rooms.description: A corrupt downtown strip lined with gaudy signs, pawn shops, and bars.

rooms.name: Courthouse Square (Burned)
rooms.description: The courthouse stands blackened and cold; soot and graffiti cover the stone.

rooms.name: Lyon Estates Slums
rooms.description: A walled, downtrodden area patrolled by Biff's thugs and filled with boarded houses.

rooms.name: Police HQ (Corrupt)
rooms.description: A once-respected station now more of a private security outpost for the powerful.

rooms.name: Pawn Row
rooms.description: A cramped row of pawn shops and secondhand dealers that thrive on desperation.

rooms.name: Contaminated River Bank
rooms.description: The river is choked with pollution here; the air smells faintly of chemicals.

rooms.name: Old Mill Ruins
rooms.description: An old mill half-collapsed, its stones blackened by neglect.

rooms.name: Town Outskirts (1985A)
rooms.description: Sparse development and broken roads lead away from the city center.

rooms.name: Biff's Garage (1985A)
rooms.description: A grimy garage serving as Biff's muscle headquarters and impound lot.

rooms.name: Mall Ruins
rooms.description: The remains of what used to be a mall, now host to illicit trade and graffiti.

rooms.name: Market Row
rooms.description: Open-air stalls hawk salvage and black-market goods under flickering lights.

rooms.name: Back Lot
rooms.description: A tangle of service roads and shipping containers, useful for getting around unnoticed.

rooms.name: Burned Clocktower
rooms.description: A skeletal clocktower that no longer keeps time; ash marks the surrounding square.

rooms.name: Reclaimed Park
rooms.description: A small park area where refuse has been pushed aside to make temporary camps.

rooms.name: Industrial Lane
rooms.description: Shuttered factories with broken windows; the hum of distant machines can be heard.

rooms.name: Warehouse Quarter
rooms.description: A dense cluster of warehouses now used for storage by various shady groups.

rooms.name: Residential Ruins
rooms.description: Boarded houses and broken fences; a few stubborn lights still burn here at night.

rooms.name: Old Bank Vault
rooms.description: An underground vault made of reinforced concrete; once prosperous, now pillaged.

rooms.name: Outdoor Arena
rooms.description: A cracked concrete arena where crowds sometimes gather for illicit entertainment.

rooms.name: Perimeter Road
rooms.description: A wide road circling the core of the city, heavily patrolled in places.
